DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to hematology or chemistry used for evaluation prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial as a determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures._the date on which an observation or an event began.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Registration Hematology Chemistry Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to hematology or chemistry used for evaluation prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial as a determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Registration Hematology Chemistry Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Hematology; the branch of medicine that deals with the blood and blood-forming organs and the diseases thereof.:The science of the composition, structure, properties, and reactions of matter, especially of atomic and molecular systems.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
The branch of medicine that deals with the blood and blood-forming organs and the diseases thereof.
The science of the composition, structure, properties, and reactions of matter, especially of atomic and molecular systems.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
